name: Friendly Ships
description:
Friendly Ships!

You are under attack from enemy ships. Some of these ships could be your allies. Moving near an enemy ship and hitting the space bar will give you a chance to convert an enemy to your side. If you can keep your new friend alive for long enough, he will start to generate points for you, which can be spent on weapon and ship upgrades.

Controls:

W - up
S -down
A - left
D - right

Left mouse click - shoot

Space bar - attempt to convert enemy.
